name: Grilled Chicken Salad
instructions: Season chicken with salt and pepper. Grill until cooked through, about 6-7 minutes per side. Slice and serve over greens with cucumber and tomatoes. Drizzle with olive oil.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook beef in a skillet until browned. Fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

name: Vegan Chili
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic. Add beans, tomatoes, and chili powder. Simmer for 30 minutes.

name: Garlic Butter Shrimp
instructions: Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and shrimp. Cook until pink, about 2-3 minutes per side. Season with salt and pepper.

name: Margherita Pizza
instructions: Spread sauce on crust. Top with mozzarella and basil. Bake at 475°F for 10-12 minutes.
